ValidationRule.description: Ensures the Mailing Address is populated for active contacts
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK(MailingCity & MailingState & MailingStreet & MailingPostalCode ) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"SSSW")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Unified Customer Service")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"AusPost Integration")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"AusPost Integration API Only")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.UserType,"AutomatedProcess")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && NOT($Permission.BSP_Community_Access) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Merchant Portal Community User")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Mypost Business Help & Support Community User")) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Customer Team")) && Not( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Inactive") ) && NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"LPO Partner Community User"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A contact must have a mailing address. If you are changing the Status to 'Left Organisation' the mailing address remains mandatory, please ensure that the contact meets the minimum mailing address requirements.
